title: Breakfast & Check-In
description: Come down to the Centre for Dialogue for free breakfast and check-in to get your badges ahead of the Summit.

title: Welcome Presentation
speaker: MC
description: Land acknowledgement and overview of the Summit program.

title: City Pulse: What Makes A City Attractive
speaker: Aftab Erfan & panelists
description: A panel discussion on the the 5 main work attractions in cities + Q & A.

title: Speed Bingo Fun!
description: Test your knowledge on topics of Urban Work!

title: Workshop: Part A - Where are we AT today? (1)
description: A data-driven workshop utilizing pre-summit information and resources for collaborative group work, defining the current state of work and opportunities.

title: Redefining the Future: A deep dive into the work ecosystem in Canada
speaker: George Benson & panelists
description: A panel discussion on the the 5 main work dimensions in cities + Q & A.

title: Workshop: Part A - Where are we AT today? (1)
speaker: John Smith
description: Report back presentations from groups.

title: Workshop: Part A- Where are we AT today? (2)
speaker: John Smith
description: Group work using the panel info, data and resources provided in the pre-summit phase to define the current state-of-work and opportunities.

title: Workshop: Part A- Where are we AT today? (2)
speaker: John Smith
description: Report back presentations from groups.

title: Where are we AT? - Wrap Up
speaker: John Smith
description: Voting opportunities to move onto the next stages.

title: End of Day 1 Wrap Up
speaker: John Smith
description: Present as a group your findings during the earlier workshop on where the city is AT today

title: Dinner
description: Choose your own adventure dinner, spend this time how you would like!

title: Breakfast & Check-In
description: Come down to the Centre for Dialogue for free breakfast and check-in for Day 2 of the Summit.

title: Day 2 Overview
description: Going over the agenda and expectations for Day 2

title: Workshop: Part B - Where do we want to BE?
speaker: John Smith
description: Creative visioning session with group work to expand on the voted opportunities for the future of work and cities.

title: Workshop: Part C - What can we CREATE?(1)
description: Session to flesh out and cluster all possible ideas based on opportunity areas coming from Parts A and B.

title: Guest Speaker
speaker: w/ Hon. Andrew Mercier
description: A talk by Hon. Andrew Mercier, Minister of State for Workforce Development + Q & A with audience.

title: Workshop: Part C- What can we CREATE?(2)
description: Group work to combine clusters of ideas and to enhance ideas to early stage concepts.

title: Workshop: Part C - What can we CREATE?(3)
description: Collective voting session to form more defined concepts and form groups based on concepts.

title: End of Day 2 Wrap Up
description: Summary of the day and overview of the next day.

title: Dinner
description: Free time for you to grab dinner or explore the city!

title: Day 3 Overview
description: Going over the agenda and expectations for Day 3

title: Guest Speaker
speaker: w/ Youth Leader + Q & A
description: TBD.

title: Workshop: Part D - What can we DO next to get to where we want to be?
description: Group work to identify resources and brainstorm for project proposal to showcase with a medium of each groups choice.

title: Workshop: Part D - Project Development
description: With mentors, groups will fine tune their proposals, create their pitch and practice.

title: Continuation of project development and Shortlisting
description: Groups will continue working on their pitch and there will be voting to shortlist the teams moving to the next stage.

title: Pitch Competition
speaker: TBA
description: 5-6 shortlisted teams will present their pitch either through a fair model or to an expert panel that provides feedback.

title: Talks
speaker: TBA
description: Brief talks featuring Minister Bailey, RBC, and LinkedIn panel.

title: Dinner
description: Catered Dinner .
